tweet: This mama is breathing easy now. All my baby chicks are finally here and we are all together for Thanksgiving.
@brianmmayfield except you are not cooking over an open fire!!!
Waiting on the boys to arrive and contemplating getting off the couch to go start baking my carrot cake.
Just passed Hillbilly Golf. My kids used to love that place!!! Great memories.
@inprogress you made me laugh out loud. Guess that woke you up!!
